mapper.select:
SELECT v.villageName, vehicle.plateNo AS plateNumber, vehicle.carType, vehicle.plateColor, vehicle.plateType, vehicle.registerName, vehicle.contactTel, vehicle.credentialType, vehicle.credentialNo, vehicle.platePic, building.buildingName, unit.unitName, house.floor, house.houseNo, d.remark FROM cw_vehicle_discovery d LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM cw_base_vehicle WHERE isLeave = 0) vehicle ON d.vehicleId = vehicle.id LEFT JOIN cw_base_village v ON vehicle.villageCode = v.villageCode LEFT JOIN cw_base_building building ON vehicle.villageCode = building.villageCode AND vehicle.buildingNo = building.buildingNo LEFT JOIN cw_base_unit unit ON vehicle.villageCode = unit.villageCode AND vehicle.buildingNo = unit.buildingNo AND vehicle.unitNo = unit.unitNo LEFT JOIN cw_base_house house ON vehicle.villageCode = house.villageCode AND vehicle.buildingNo = house.buildingNo AND vehicle.unitNo = house.unitNo AND vehicle.houseNo = house.houseNo
d.id = #{handleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cw_base_vehicle ( villageCode, plateNo, plateColor, plateType, carType, registerName, credentialType, credentialNo, contactTel, buildingNo, unitNo, floorNo, houseNo, platePic ) VALUES ( #{villageCode}, #{plateNo}, #{plateColor}, #{plateType}, #{carType}, #{registerName}, #{credentialType}, #{credentialNo}, #{contactTel}, #{buildingNo}, #{unitNo}, #{floorNo}, #{houseNo}, #{platePic} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE cw_base_vehicle
plateColor = #{plateColor},
plateType = #{plateType},
carType = #{carType},
registerName = #{registerName},
credentialType = #{credentialType},
credentialNo = #{credentialNo},
contactTel = #{contactTel},
buildingNo = #{buildingNo},
unitNo = #{unitNo},
floorNo = #{floorNo},
houseNo = #{houseNo},
isLeave = #{isLeave},
platePic = #{platePic}
plateNo = #{plateNo}
AND villageCode = #{villageCode}
UPDATE cw_vehicle_discovery SET STATUS = 2 WHERE STATUS = 1
UPDATE cw_vehicle_leave SET STATUS = 2 WHERE STATUS = 1
UPDATE cw_vehicle_retention SET STATUS = 2 WHERE STATUS = 1
